With an all-star cast, including Alfred Hitchcock himself, this film is a must-see for anyone who loves a good mystery.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more recent, "The Way Back Home" might be up your alley. This heartwarming drama follows a man as he returns to his hometown and discovers that life has taken him down a different path than he expected. With its beautiful settings and thought-provoking themes, it's a great choice if you're looking for something that will make you feel good.
